entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
